meanings.definition: To let saliva flow from the mouth
meanings.sent2: The dog drooled when it smelled food.
meanings.sent3: The toddler drooled over the colorful toy.
meanings.sent4: The leaky faucet drooled water all day.
meanings.sent5: The delicious cake made her drool with anticipation.

meanings.definition: To show excessive admiration or desire for something
meanings.sent1: She drooled over the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent2: He drooled over the fancy sports car.
meanings.sent3: The students drooled over the idea of no homework.
meanings.sent4: The artist drooled over the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The food critic drooled over the gourmet meal.
